chargeHist.descr: Knowingly Violate a Domestic Abuse Order

result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy L Stewart Sr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • False Imprisonment [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.30.
  • Intimidate Victim/Threaten Force, etc., a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.45(3).
  • Substantial Battery-Intend Bodily Harm, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concur to ct 2.  Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program not until May 14, 2018.  Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program not until May 14, 2018.

superMiscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.

Def not to be in Dane without his agent approval.  Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with KLA, victims or their families.
8/13/15 Crt amends condition of probation to Def not to be in Dane County without the written permission of his agent & Def shall have no contact, direct or indirect, with KLA without her written permission and the written approval of his agent.
Completion of certified domestic violence treatment.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

supervisions.notes: Consec to any other sentence currently serving.
